titleInfo.title: USA v. Martinez
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Sonia Martinez. ***Change of Plea Hearing set for 5/6/2008 at 12:30 PM in Courtroom 1 - Lincoln before Judge Richard G. Kopf. XT excludable started 3/11/2008-5/6/2008. Termed 3/24/2008 trial date. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER as to defendant Sonia Martinez. ***Change of Plea Hearing set for 5/6/2008 at 12:30 PM in Courtroom 1 - Lincoln before Judge Richard G. Kopf. XT excludable started 3/11/2008-5/6/2008. Termed 3/24/2008 trial date. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Martinez
titleInfo.subTitle: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture, filing 39 is hereby sustained. The United States is hereby authorized to seize the $1,437.00 in United States currency. The Defendant's interest in said property is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law, subject to the provisions of 21 U.S.C., § 853(n)(1). Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture in which all interests will be addressed as to Sonia Martinez (1). Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (1 Certified copy to USM)( GJG, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture, filing 39 is hereby sustained. The United States is hereby authorized to seize the $1,437.00 in United States currency. The Defendant's interest in said property is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law, subject to the provisions of 21 U.S.C., § 853(n)(1). Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture in which all interests will be addressed as to Sonia Martinez (1). Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (1 Certified copy to USM)( GJG, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Martinez
titleInfo.subTitle: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report and Addendum as to defendant Sonia Martinez. It is ordered that: (1) The defendant's objection 42 to drug quantity, career offender status, and criminal history will be resolved at sentencing. (2) Except to the extent (if at all) that I have sustained an objection or granted a motion or reserved an issue for later resolution in the preceding paragraph, the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects. ETC. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report and Addendum as to defendant Sonia Martinez. It is ordered that: (1) The defendant's objection 42 to drug quantity, career offender status, and criminal history will be resolved at sentencing. (2) Except to the extent (if at all) that I have sustained an objection or granted a motion or reserved an issue for later resolution in the preceding paragraph, the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects. ETC. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Martinez
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFIETURE - The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture, filing 46 is hereby sustained. All right, title and interest in and to the $1,437.00 in United States currency, held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The $1,437.00 in United States currency, be, and the same hereby is, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Marshal for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law as to Sonia Martinez. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (1 Certified copy to USM)( GJG, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: FINAL ORDER OF FORFIETURE - The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture, filing 46 is hereby sustained. All right, title and interest in and to the $1,437.00 in United States currency, held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The $1,437.00 in United States currency, be, and the same hereby is, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Marshal for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law as to Sonia Martinez. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (1 Certified copy to USM)( GJG, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Martinez
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to defendant Sonia Martinez (1). Defendant pleaded guilty to Counts I and II of the Indictment and is committed to the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of one hundred fifty (150) months; 5 years supervised release with special conditions; $100.00 special assessment. Final order of forfeiture filed on 07/30/2008 as to Count II. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (4 Certified copies to USM)(JAB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to defendant Sonia Martinez (1). titleInfo.title: USA v. Martinez
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Sonia Martinez. It is ordered that:(1)The government's request for hearing is granted.(2)A hearing on the government's motion for reduction of sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 60 has been set before the undersigned United States district judge on Friday, February 5, 2010, at 11:30 a.m., in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska.(3)At the request of the defendant through her counsel, the defendant will participate in the hearing by telephone.(4)The Marshal is directed not to return the defendant to the district.(5)The defendant is held to have waived her right to be present.(6)Counsel for the defendant, if previously appointed pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act, is reappointed to represent the defendant for purposes of the Rule 35(b) motion. If retained, counsel for the defendant remains as counsel for the defendant until the Rule 35(b) motion is resolved or until given leave to withdraw.(7)The Federal Public Defender shall provide CJA counsel with a new voucher.(8)The Clerk of the Court shall provide a copy of this order to counsel for the government and counsel for the defendant. The undersigned's judicial assistant will provide a copy to the Federal Public Defender. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER as to defendant Sonia Martinez. It is ordered that:(1)The government's request for hearing is granted.(2)A hearing on the government's motion for reduction of sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 60 has been set before the undersigned United States district judge on Friday, February 5, 2010, at 11:30 a.m., in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska.(3)At the request of the defendant through her counsel, the defendant will participate in the hearing by telephone.(4)The Marshal is directed not to return the defendant to the district.(5)The defendant is held to have waived her right to be present.(6)Counsel for the defendant, if previously appointed pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act, is reappointed to represent the defendant for purposes of the Rule 35(b) motion. If retained, counsel for the defendant remains as counsel for the defendant until the Rule 35(b) motion is resolved or until given leave to withdraw.(7)The Federal Public Defender shall provide CJA counsel with a new voucher.(8)The Clerk of the Court shall provide a copy of this order to counsel for the government and counsel for the defendant. The undersigned's judicial assistant will provide a copy to the Federal Public Defender. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )
